name: El waar PRO
description:
Al-Waar is a real person who lives a routine life, until the day he turns his life upside down, when his sister was kidnapped by antiquities dealers who want to sacrifice her for unknown and secret reasons.

This game can played only on PC

This game is made with : Gdevelop 4
